channel.title: Comments on: Who Are The Oldest Players In The Top 100 Of Men’s Tennis in 2019?
channel.description: Your secret weapon on the court.

item.title: By: Gian Marco Penuliar
item.dc:creator: Gian Marco Penuliar
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/who-are-the-oldest-players-in-the-top-100-of-mens-tennis-in-2019/#comment-14">Anton</a>.
Totally agree with you. The title says “Oldest tennis player”so it doesn’t specify which category.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Anton.

Totally agree with you. The title says “Oldest tennis player”so it doesn’t specify which category.

item.title: By: Anton
item.dc:creator: Anton
item.description:
I don,t see Ivo Carlovic-41 years old and Leander Paes-46 years old in your list.
Btw. Leo Paes is maybe more underestimated Grand Slam Winner
He won 18 Grand Slams-double
Rafael Nadal won 18 Grand Slams-single.
I have full respect for Big 3/Federer,Nadal,Djokovic/ and their Total 53 Grand Slams /20+18+15/-before Wimbledon2019,but Leo Paes deserves respect too!
Clear-your idea was "oldest ATP players in Top 100"
P.S. I am not fan of Leander Paes.
item.content:encoded:
I don,t see Ivo Carlovic-41 years old and Leander Paes-46 years old in your list.

Btw. Leo Paes is maybe more underestimated Grand Slam Winner

He won 18 Grand Slams-double

Rafael Nadal won 18 Grand Slams-single.

I have full respect for Big 3/Federer,Nadal,Djokovic/ and their Total 53 Grand Slams /20+18+15/-before Wimbledon2019,but Leo Paes deserves respect too!

Clear-your idea was “oldest ATP players in Top 100”

P.S. I am not fan of Leander Paes.
